sample

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Simulator

  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    It our simulator class Basically backend Server for our App It has list of individuals and all things about it It has our gameloop. When simulation started from UI Controller creates a thread runs this class's run function(Our gameloop)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addMany(int pop)
      Uses Individual factories and create that many Individual and add them to alivePopulation list

      Call all individuals draw function.
      void run()
      Its our main gameloop It does some further initialization after construction Because hospital other calculations need Pop count It calls move cleanDead collisionCheck hospitalizeInfected render it checks every time pause boolean if "pause" assigned as true it will wait for a lock In controller continue notifies that lock so it can continue it runs until simWorks flag is true when sim ends controller turn that flag false and joins the thread

      • run

        public void run()
         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Its our main gameloop It does some further initialization after construction Because hospital other calculations need Pop count It calls move cleanDead collisionCheck hospitalizeInfected render it checks every time pause boolean if "pause" assigned as true it will wait for a lock In controller continue notifies that lock so it can continue it runs until simWorks flag is true when sim ends controller turn that flag false and joins the thread
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
